mapper.sql: NEWS_ID as newsId, NEWS_VIEWS as newsViews, NEWS_TITLE as newsTitle, NEWS_KEYWORD as newsKeyword, NEWS_CONTENT as newsContent, NEWS_FROM as newsFrom, NEWS_REF as newsRef, NEWS_TYPE as newsType, NEWS_DOWN as newsDown, NEWS_FOR as newsFor, NEWS_PICTURES_PATH as newsPicturesPath, CREATOR as creator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, LAST_MODIFIER as lastModifier, LAST_MODIFY_TIME as lastModifyTime
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RM_NEWS_INFO( NEWS_VIEWS, NEWS_TITLE, NEWS_KEYWORD, NEWS_CONTENT, NEWS_FROM, NEWS_REF, NEWS_TYPE, NEWS_DOWN, NEWS_PICTURES_PATH, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, LAST_MODIFIER, LAST_MODIFY_TIME, NEWS_FOR ) VALUES( #{newsViews}, #{newsTitle}, #{newsKeyword}, #{newsContent}, #{newsFrom}, #{newsRef}, #{newsType}, #{newsDown}, #{newsPicturesPath}, #{creator}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModifyTime}, #{newsFor} );
mapper.update: update RM_NEWS_INFO set NEWS_DOWN='0' where NEWS_ID = #{newsId}

WHERE NEWS_ID=#{newsId}
